ai_techniques.name: LangGraph for Agent Tools
ai_techniques.description: Using LangGraph with LangChain to implement agentic tools and workflows, particularly for creating long-term memory in conversational agents.
ai_techniques.use_case: Creating conversational agents with persistent memory

ai_techniques.name: SerpAPI for Unified Search
ai_techniques.description: Using SerpAPI to integrate multiple search sources (like Yelp and Bing) under a single API, reducing the complexity of implementing multiple separate APIs.

ai_techniques.name: Embedding-Based Research Paper Relevancy
ai_techniques.description: A technique to rank research papers by relevance using embeddings and LLM scoring without requiring vector databases, calculating mathematical similarity scores based on token embeddings.

ai_techniques.name: AI Schema Validation
ai_techniques.description: Using Google AI Studio's new JSON schema validation feature to enforce structured output from language models, ensuring responses follow a specific format for easier integration with other systems.
ai_techniques.use_case: Reliable structured output generation for DSLs and APIs

ai_techniques.name: Open Source LLM Tool Calling
ai_techniques.description: Implementing function calling capabilities with open source models like Quinn, addressing challenges related to inconsistent behavior compared to proprietary models even at temperature zero.
challenges: Stochastic behavior even at temperature zero
Lack of specific fine-tuning for tool calling
ai_techniques.use_case: Building agents with local open source models

ai_techniques.name: Few-Shot Prompting for Tool Use
ai_techniques.description: Using few-shot examples to improve tool calling reliability with smaller open source models that may not be specifically tuned for function calling.
ai_techniques.use_case: Enhancing tool use reliability with open source models

ai_techniques.name: FigJam for AI Project Planning
ai_techniques.description: Using FigJam (a collaborative whiteboarding tool from Figma) for planning and wireframing AI applications and agent workflows.
ai_techniques.use_case: Collaborative AI project planning and visualization

ai_techniques.name: Cross-API Research Tool
ai_techniques.description: Building a system that queries multiple academic APIs (like Semantic Scholar, PubMed) to cross-reference research papers, using tool calling to select appropriate sources based on the research domain.
ai_techniques.use_case: Comprehensive academic research across multiple sources
ai_techniques.platform: Multiple academic APIs with tool calling

challenges_discussed.description: Open source models showing inconsistent behavior for tool calling even at temperature zero
solutions_proposed: Few-shot prompting to guide the model

challenges_discussed.description: Unexpected threading behavior when combining multiple LLMs in the same application
solutions_proposed: Better understanding of LangGraph's threading model
Isolating model functions and carefully managing state

challenges_discussed.description: Several participants mentioned difficulty adapting to TypeScript when implementing AI projects
solutions_proposed: Focusing first on functionality then improving typing

challenges_discussed.description: Getting models to reliably produce structured outputs in specific formats
solutions_proposed: Using AI Studio's JSON schema validation

resource_links.description: API that provides access to search results from multiple sources
Specific API endpoint for accessing recipe results from Bing
LangChain documentation for implementing long-term memory in agents
DeepLearning.ai course on AI agents in LangGraph
DeepLearning.ai course on long-term agentic memory with LangGraph
LinkedIn Learning course on agentic AI fundamentals
